headline: What's In Store For Comcast This Earnings Season? Analyst Predicts New Pricing Strategies Amid Competitive Pressures
summary: Goldman Sachs analyst Michael Ng reiterated the Buy rating on Comcast Corporation (NASDAQ:CMCSA), with a price forecast of $44. The analyst predicts that Comcast’s EBITDA for the first quarter of 2025 will be approximately $9.19 billion, slightly above the consensus estimate of $9.18 billion. Ng slightly lowered the first quarter Connectivity & Platforms EBITDA estimate to $8.21 billion from $8.22 billion prior, driven by a lower Wireless revenue estimate. The analyst projects Content & Experien

headline: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) Partners With Measured For Enhanced TV Ad Insights 2% Rise
summary: Comcast (NasdaqGS:CMCSA) experienced a 2% price increase over the past week. This movement coincides with significant developments such as the partnership between Universal Ads, a Comcast subsidiary, and Measured, aimed at optimizing media strategies across premium networks like NBCUniversal. This initiative enhances attribution and content access, aligning with modern digital advertising needs. Furthermore, Comcast's expansion of internet services in Georgia potentially strengthens its...

headline: Atlanta executive leader steps up to save lives, improve heart health
summary: Tracy Pitcher, senior vice president of Comcast Business Central Division, will lead the charge as the 2025 American Heart Association Heart Walk chairperson to build a community of lifesavers in Atlanta.

headline: Comcast Connects First Homes and Businesses in Leonardtown, MD Area to Its State-of-the-Art Network
summary: LEONARDTOWN, Md., March 25, 2025--Comcast today announced it connected the first residents in Leonardtown, MD to Xfinity and Comcast Business services. These are the first of 5,800 homes and businesses that Comcast is connecting to reliable, high-speed, symmetrical, Internet in the Leonardtown area.

headline: Comcast’s Universal Ads Names Measured as Strategic Incrementality Measurement Partner to Drive Performance and ROI Across Premium Video Advertising
summary: NEW YORK, March 25, 2025--Universal Ads, which enables brands of any size to seamlessly make and buy commercials across premium video, announced a strategic partnership with Measured, the pioneer and leader of incrementality-based measurement and optimization. Through this partnership, brands buying across the Universal Ads platform will be able to get valuable performance insights into their campaigns and improve their overall media strategy using the Measured technology platform.
